scenario_name: Model Inversion Attack on Customer Churn Prediction
description: A malicious actor attempts to reconstruct sensitive customer data from a publicly accessible churn prediction model using a model inversion attack.  The attacker aims to identify high-value customers based on inferred characteristics, potentially leading to targeted phishing or fraud.
initial_goal: Obtain a list of high-value customers likely to churn based on publicly available model predictions.
constraints: data_anonymization: model outputs are not directly linked to PII
enterprise_context: Investment/Consumer Banking: A customer churn prediction model, trained on anonymized customer data, is deployed as a public API for internal use and research purposes.
